glsa.title: kwalletd: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: Kwalletd password stores are vulnerable to codebook attacks.

background.p: Kwalletd is is a credentials management application for KDE.

description.p: Kwalletd in KWallet uses Blowfish with ECB mode instead of CBC mode when encrypting the password store.

impact.p: Local attackers, with access to the password store, could conduct a codebook attack in order to obtain confidential passwords.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All kwalletd users should upgrade to the latest version:
